author: doogie
msg: Add support to loadCartFromOrder for reading of the OrderItemShipGroup

author: doogie
msg: Add a feature to loadCartFromOrder to allow it to include promo items
into the cart, as they are read from the database.  This is useful when
the cart will eventually be used in a read-only type fashion, as the
cart will look identical to what it was before the order was created.

author: uschindler
msg: Fix broken MBean test: new File(URL.getPath()) is the wrong way to create filenames from "file:" URLs coming from Classloader. The problem: some characters are escaped, e.g. the whitespace in my user's home directory. The correct way is to cast to URI using toURI() and invoking the URI-ctor in File (this is the "official" way to go).
